function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rise in spousal violence during lockdown","Impact":"Increased depression and suicidal thoughts among victims","Mitigation":"Provide support and assistance to victims, increase awareness, and implement intervention programs","Technologies":"Online counseling services, mobile applications for reporting violence, and community support networks","People":"Married women in India, women in Tunisia, IPV victims attending a radiology clinic, callers to national helplines, and callers to IPV support centers in Italy","Owner":"Counseling organizations, support groups, government agencies, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in IPV during lockdown","Impact":"Higher self-reported scores for depression, anxiety, and stress among victims","Mitigation":"Promote mental health services, increase awareness, and implement intervention programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online therapy services, and mental health apps","People":"Women in Tunisia, IPV victims attending a radiology clinic, and callers to national helplines","Owner":"Mental health organizations, community organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"180% increase in IPV at a radiology clinic during lockdown","Impact":"Twice the number of high-risk mechanism injuries and violence than in the previous three years","Mitigation":"Enhance access to emergency care, increase awareness, and implement intervention programs","Technologies":"Emergency response apps, emergency medical services, and online reporting platforms","People":"IPV victims attending a radiology clinic","Owner":"Emergency medical services, healthcare providers, and government agencies"}]}
